riddles.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have no body, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
riddles.hint: You hear it in mountains and caves

riddles.question: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
riddles.hint: You make them when you walk

riddles.question: I have cities, but no houses. I have mountains, but no trees. I have water, but no fish. What am I?
riddles.hint: You use it to find your way

riddles.question: What has keys but no locks, space but no room, and you can enter but not go inside?
I'm tall when I'm young, and short when I'm old. What am I?
What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?
What gets wetter the more it dries?
riddles.hint: You use it after a shower

riddles.question: I'm light as a feather, but the strongest person can't hold me for more than a few minutes. What am I?
riddles.hint: You do it all the time

riddles.question: What has hands but can't clap?
What goes up but never comes down?
